name: Crumbling Down
description:
You're a pretty powerful vampire! At least, you used to be. Unfortunately, you've been asleep for a really long time, and the repairs on your castle have kind of gone by the wayside - the whole thing threatens to crumble beneath your feet.

Worst of all, there's a posse of well-armed garlic-draped would-be tomb robbers trying to take your hard-earned stuff for themselves - and they probably want to do you in at the same time! Rough.

There's only one real solution: take your gold, your gems, and your filthy lucre and get out, but without falling prey to your own unstable castle (or the invaders)! Luckily, you still have a couple tricks up your sleeve - if you can find the magic items that will let you use them...

Created in 72 hours for LDJAM 49. The theme was "unstable."

----
